result.name: compulsory-purchase-orders4
result.notes:
Compulory Purchase Orders (CPOs) that are registerable (in the local land charges register) after 1 January 2012 located within the Hastings Borough Council Administrative Area. (Polygon Dataset). CPOs registered before 1 January 2012 are to be added at a later date.
